111.a: Meeting Wonders and Frontiers of Science -- CNPq 45 Years

245.c: editors, Jacob Palis, José Galizia Tundisi ; [José Galizia Tundisi ... et al.].

260.b: Conselho Nacional de Desenvolvimento Científico e Tecnológico

500.a: Trabalhos apresentados na "Meeting Wonders and Frontiers of Science - CNPq 45 Years", realizado no Instituto de Matemática Pura e Aplicada, nos dias 11-15 de março de 1996.

505.a: Preface -- A view on CNPq and its Research Institutes -- Chaos: Finding a horseshoe on the beaches of Rio -- The universe as seen through hubble space telescope -- Astronomy and space research -- Chemical evolution of the universe -- Third generation synchroton radiation sources -- Ancient and modern hunter-gathers of Amazônia -- The conservation of biodiversity in Amazônia -- The greening of metals (Industrial Ecology in the New Millenium) -- The future of extractive metallurgy -- Three avenues to scientific knowledge -- Towards the global information society -- Building markets and community (The significance of the world wide web for both business and scholarship) -- Acessing scientific and technological information in Brazil (The problem of professional education in information science) -- The birth of elementary particles -- Weak interaction physics: from its oring ot the electroweak model
